import React from "react"; import "./booking.css"; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, List } from "reactstrap"; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const handleChange = e => { e.preventDefault() } return (

${price} /per persion

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* bookingform */}
Information
{/* booking end */} {/* bookingbottom */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
); }; export default Booking;
